Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of a number of lines of red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394783) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394783)
